pr_title: Add proxy support for glue udb

timeline.message: Add proxy support for glue udb

timeline.author: yuzhu

timeline.bodyText: is there a boolean Property type?
timeline.author: yuzhu

replies.bodyText: shouldn't the default be false then?
replies.author: yuzhu

timeline.bodyText:
Do we need this? Instead, can we assume that if aws.proxy.host is set, then proxy is enabled? We would be able to do this if the proxy is enabled IFF aws.proxy.host is set.
Otherwise, if we need to keep this, can this be renamed to aws.proxy.enable? It would feel more consistent with the other proxy related properties.
Lastly, is this an aws type of configuration, or a glue specific configuration? If it is glue specific, I feel like we don't even need the aws. prefix, since this is for the glue UDB?
timeline.author: gpang

replies.bodyText: You are right, I changed to use aws.proxy.host as trigger. These configurations are used to building the AWS client configurations, it may better to keep the aws. prefix?
replies.author: HelloHorizon

timeline.message: Use proxy host to enable glue proxy
